QuestData.Title: Hellfire Fortifications
QuestData.Description: The Hellfire Citadel wages constant battles with our forces. We are holding our own so far, but we can't yet launch a real offensive against them. To do that, we need forward staging areas.$B$BOur scouts identified three fortifications near Hellfire Citadel. We want you to help secure these forts. Capture each fort, and then report back to me.$B$BMay fortune shine upon you in the conflicts ahead, $n, for you will no doubt clash with Horde forces eager to gain these same fortifications.
QuestData.LogDescription: Capture the Overlook, the Stadium and Broken Hill, then return to Warrant Officer Tracy Proudwell in Honor Hold in Hellfire Peninsula.
QuestData.CompletionText: $N, return to me when you have aided in the capture of each of the forts!
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n. Your actions in the field are instrumental in our battle for Hellfire Peninsula.
